RESEARCH_MUNICIPALITY.notes: The City of Snohomish, WA operates under a mayor-council government. As of the November 2025 General Election, Aaron Hoffman has been elected Mayor, replacing Linda Redmon. Anup Deol has been elected to Position 7, replacing Karen Guzak. Maygen Hetherington (Position 1) announced her resignation effective at the end of 2025, and the city council is in the process of appointing a replacement. Council members are elected at-large for staggered four-year terms.
